name: Get Your Claws Off My Island, You Damn Dirty Bots!
name_original: Get Your Claws Off My Island, You Damn Dirty Bots!
description:
Bots have taken over your beautiful summer island! Take it back at all costs!

>>>>>>NOTE: At the moment there's an unresolved bug that renders the animation on the computer screens to be non existent and downgrades the visual quality of the game. If you'd like the full experience I'd recommend downloading the game to play. :D Thanks :D <<<<<<<<<

This game was made for Unity's "Summer is Here" Game Jam! :D https://connect.unity.com/challenges/summer-is-here

===============================================================
